0.1 complete - see comment in issue #02
Issue #02 * Added: New resource page for user to create new resources.
Added js-cookie
Functions added to pass the resource title and url back from the WordPress post to the dashboard widget. It does not yet update the original name.
It can now update the original widget name and URL.

It can now update the original widget name and URL. Bug fixes: * session variables weren't being reset for existing resources. As a result, exisitng resources were being renamed to whatever was stored in the session variables from when a new resource was created last.
Bug fixes: * updated functionality to include all custom post types
commit before allowing search-autocomplete to run with admin privileges
#bug discovered - if you open two colourboxes in quick succession, the system will break (i think due to an unfinished function being overridden somewhere). Fix next!

0.0.1.10
* Changed: Binding colourboxes to dynamically created resources now works without refreshing the page * Changed: Added BlockUI to prevent users from interrupting ajax calls * Added: Style unlinked resources like Wikipedia (unwritten articles) * Added: Link to exisitng resources (like GitHub)
## 0.0.1.11 (2015-06-17) * Changed: Screen options to Widget Manager (and toggle widgets) * Changed: "New Note" functionality to match resources & todos (append on enter instead of CTRL + Enter)
## 0.0.2.1 (2015-07-07) * Changed: all post types
## 0.0.3.1 (2015-07-25) * Added strategy pane
## 0.0.4.1 (2015-07-28) * Added user management system (does not accept payment - only separates out use generated content on the backend)
## 0.0.4.1 (2015-07-28) * Added user management system (does not accept payment - only separates out use generated content on the backend)
## 0.0.4.1.3 (2015-07-28) * Fixed bug in orderby for activities in strategy pane
## 0.0.6.7 (2015-07-28) * restyling activities pane
## 0.0.6.7 (2015-07-28) * restyling activities pane

0.0.6.8 - Display back arrow and selected activity 0.0.6.9 - Add pagination to selected activity 0.0.6.10 - Style selected activity to match prototype 0.0.6.11 - Fix initial styling to match styles applied by jQuery 0.0.6.12 - CSS formatting - Hide "widget visibility" icon

0.0.6.8 - Display back arrow and selected activity 0.0.6.9 - Add pagination to selected activity 0.0.6.10 - Style selected activity to match prototype 0.0.6.11 - Fix initial styling to match styles applied by jQuery 0.0.6.12 - CSS formatting - Hide "widget visibility" icon

0.0.6.8 - Display back arrow and selected activity 0.0.6.9 - Add pagination to selected activity 0.0.6.10 - Style selected activity to match prototype 0.0.6.11 - Fix initial styling to match styles applied by jQuery 0.0.6.12 - CSS formatting - Hide "widget visibility" icon
0.1.0.1: * Cleaned up Piklist metaboxes * Fixed GitHub upload error * Updated "back arrow" image url on strategy pane (it's hardcoded at the moment)
0.1.0.2: * Added twentyfifteen-child theme to display homepage and select resource pages properly
0.1.0.2: * Added twentyfifteen-child theme to display homepage and select resource pages properly
0.1.0.3: * fixed url to back button in strategy pane
0.1.1.2: * fixed widget move bug on dashboard caused by unclosed div in strategy pane
0.1.1.2: * fixed widget move bug on dashboard caused by unclosed div in strategy pane

0.1.1.3: bug fixes - Set "Contact Details" as the default tab in the "People" app - Fix resource linkback function - Show strategy pane in post edit screens (with ability to change strategy disabled as it bugs out WordPress)

0.1.1.4: update fonts to Roboto & Roboto Slab - Added admin-style.css to twentyfifteen-child - Added function to admin_enqueue_scripts to child functions.php - From now on, modify all CSS in the child theme
0.1.1.5: added fail2ban to prevent brute force attacks (this is happening according to logs)
0.1.1.5: added fail2ban to prevent brute force attacks (this is happening according to logs)

MESSAGE.value: 0.1 complete - see comment in issue #02
Issue #02 * Added: New resource page for user to create new resources.
Added js-cookie
Functions added to pass the resource title and url back from the WordPress post to the dashboard widget. It does not yet update the original name.
It can now update the original widget name and URL.

It can now update the original widget name and URL. Bug fixes: * session variables weren't being reset for existing resources. As a result, exisitng resources were being renamed to whatever was stored in the session variables from when a new resource was created last.
Bug fixes: * updated functionality to include all custom post types

#bug discovered - if you open two colourboxes in quick succession, the system will break (i think due to an unfinished function being overridden somewhere). Fix next!

0.0.1.10
* Changed: Binding colourboxes to dynamically created resources now works without refreshing the page * Changed: Added BlockUI to prevent users from interrupting ajax calls * Added: Style unlinked resources like Wikipedia (unwritten articles) * Added: Link to exisitng resources (like GitHub)
## 0.0.1.11 (2015-06-17) * Changed: Screen options to Widget Manager (and toggle widgets) * Changed: "New Note" functionality to match resources & todos (append on enter instead of CTRL + Enter)
## 0.0.2.1 (2015-07-07) * Changed: all post types
## 0.0.3.1 (2015-07-25) * Added strategy pane
## 0.0.4.1 (2015-07-28) * Added user management system (does not accept payment - only separates out use generated content on the backend)
## 0.0.4.1.3 (2015-07-28) * Fixed bug in orderby for activities in strategy pane
## 0.0.6.7 (2015-07-28) * restyling activities pane

0.0.6.8 - Display back arrow and selected activity 0.0.6.9 - Add pagination to selected activity 0.0.6.10 - Style selected activity to match prototype 0.0.6.11 - Fix initial styling to match styles applied by jQuery 0.0.6.12 - CSS formatting - Hide "widget visibility" icon
0.1.0.1: * Cleaned up Piklist metaboxes * Fixed GitHub upload error * Updated "back arrow" image url on strategy pane (it's hardcoded at the moment)
0.1.0.2: * Added twentyfifteen-child theme to display homepage and select resource pages properly
0.1.0.3: * fixed url to back button in strategy pane
0.1.1.2: * fixed widget move bug on dashboard caused by unclosed div in strategy pane

0.1.1.3: bug fixes - Set "Contact Details" as the default tab in the "People" app - Fix resource linkback function - Show strategy pane in post edit screens (with ability to change strategy disabled as it bugs out WordPress)

0.1.1.4: update fonts to Roboto & Roboto Slab - Added admin-style.css to twentyfifteen-child - Added function to admin_enqueue_scripts to child functions.php - From now on, modify all CSS in the child theme
0.1.1.5: added fail2ban to prevent brute force attacks (this is happening according to logs)
